title.narrative: Food and Nutrition to Famine Affected Populations (Mayendit North, Unity State) - Final transfer

description.narrative: This project is set up to facilitate the final transfer in a closed project. Food and Nutrition to Famine Affected Populations (Mayendit North, Unity State) <http://promiselive.caid.local/ChristianAid/userdefined/edit.aspx?id=%7b06D6FE0D-0B0F-E711-AAE8-005056BE001C%7d&_CreateFromType=1&_CreateFromId=%7b0583BFDD-D425-E311-9C4C-005056BE001C%7d&etc=10000#>

This project is set up to facilitate the final transfer in a closed project.
This emergency intervention was carried out in Mayendit North of mayendit County. UNIDO intervened in two payams Tharker payam and Dablual payams
ACTIVITIES: 1.Community mobilization, identification, selection, registration and verification of beneficiary list. 2.Procurement of 1000 fishing nets and 1000 boxes of hooks to 1000HHs famine affected population from the two payams (500HHs per each) 3.Procurement of lentils to 1000HHs famine affected population from Tharker and Dablual payams. 4.Procurement of canoe boat. 5.Distribution of the fishing kits and CSB to the targeted population. 6.Procurement and Distribution of High Energy Biscuits to the famine affected 1000HHs in Tharker and Dablual payam respectively. 7. Procurement of Survival kits to the affected 1000HHs in the above payams. 8. Distribution of survival kits 1000HHs vulnerable affected community who lost their asset during the fight. (beneficiary numbers listed below are based on 1000 target households with an average HH of 7 people)

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom

description.narrative: Internal allocation from income source to partner Project
Internal allocation from income source to partner Project
